ygData.subject: Re: How to learn a language
ygData.msgSnippet: ... excellent? In other words, how would two average speakers of Old Erudian work their language skill up? Someone told me that we should group, spam each
ygData.messageBody:
>> Tom, how do you improve a language without learning from someone who is
excellent? In other words, how would two average speakers of Old Erudian
work their language skill up? Someone told me that we should group, spam
each other, get two improves, then zone. Then repeat until you faint. Is
this correct? <<

Yes, it is correct. A friend and I were able to work our Old Erudian from
awful to average this way. We'll be working it up to excellent another time.

Basically, you can improve someone to 1 skill point over your level. When
you zone, the other person improves you to one over their level. Repeat ad
nauseum.

Kristi, Level 18 Human Magician on Bristlebain
